text: Me bizir kɨ damuasa me mɨkemeziba abɨgha arazir kɨ ifongeziba me dar aghuagha akɨribagh ighegha na gasara. Me bar moghɨra Sabatɨn arazimɨn gɨn zuir puvatɨgha anebɨragha ghaze, a pura dughiar kɨnim. Egha me uan inazir afeziabar asebar ziaba fasa zurara da bagha gari. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nguazir kɨ me ganɨngizim, kɨ me inigh an mangan aghua. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ ghaze, kɨ me aghamsightɨ, me tintinibar kantrin igharazibar mangegham.
